name: imap-email-sync
description: Real-time IMAP email synchronization system with persistent connections

scripts.dev:all: npm run docker:up && npm run docker:wait-healthy && concurrently "npm run api:dev" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.docker:wait-healthy: node -e "const axios = require('axios'); const check = async () => { for(let i=0; i<30; i++) { try { await axios.get('http://localhost:9200/_cluster/health?wait_for_status=yellow&timeout=60s'); console.log('Elasticsearch is healthy'); return; } catch(e) { console.log(`Waiting for Elasticsearch... (${i+1}/30)`); await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 2000)); } } throw new Error('Elasticsearch not ready'); }; check();"
